issue.title: [CF 741] Icon always shows up
issue.body:
Has anyone seen a problem where their icons appear even when the buff, etc. isn't active?  Makes it hard to tell when I can cast the spell and when I can't.


> Posted by CurseForge user effigy345 | Imported from CurseForge issue #741 | Raw

comments.body:
You are either in configuration mode or you have both of the icon's Show States and Opacity settings enabled. Without an export string, though, I can't provide much more help than this.

If this is not the issue, then please post the export string of the icon(s) that you are having trouble with. To get an export string, open the icon editor, and click button labeled "Import/Export/Backup". Select the "To string" ... "Icon: #" option, and then press CTRL+C to copy it to your clipboard.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
